description:
If I create a volume, and then create a volume-snapshot of that volume, and then try to delete both, the snapshot deletes, but the volume does not.  To make things weirder, the volume goes from the state 'deleting' to 'available'

Steps to reproduce:

> create a volume
> snapshot that volume 
> nova volume-snapshot-delete [snapshot_id]; nova volume-delete [volume_id]

Expected:

Deletion of both objects

Actual:

The state is deleting for a while, and then goes to available.

stack@toneiric:~/devstack/exercises$ nova volume-snapshot-delete 3; nova volume-delete 3
stack@toneiric:~/devstack/exercises$ nova volume-list
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| ID |  Status  |  Display Name  | Size | Volume Type | Attached to |
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| 3  | deleting | myvol-1491d647 | 1    | None        |             |
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
stack@toneiric:~/devstack/exercises$ nova volume-list
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| ID |  Status  |  Display Name  | Size | Volume Type | Attached to |
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| 3  | deleting | myvol-1491d647 | 1    | None        |             |
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
stack@toneiric:~/devstack/exercises$ nova volume-list
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| ID |  Status  |  Display Name  | Size | Volume Type | Attached to |
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| 3  | deleting | myvol-1491d647 | 1    | None        |             |
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
stack@toneiric:~/devstack/exercises$ nova volume-list
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| ID |  Status  |  Display Name  | Size | Volume Type | Attached to |
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| 3  | deleting | myvol-1491d647 | 1    | None        |             |
+----+----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
stack@toneiric:~/devstack/exercises$ nova volume-list
+----+-----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| ID |   Status  |  Display Name  | Size | Volume Type | Attached to |
+----+-----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| 3  | available | myvol-1491d647 | 1    | None        |             |
+----+-----------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
title: deleted volume becomes available

comments.content: This is somewhat an artifact of the fact that volumes with snapshots can not be deleted.  A fix for https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/968700 should also fix this.
